name: Angry Driver
description:
A small game made by my 8 year old son and me. He's made all the art assets and also the game design itself.

How many points can you get? :)

The motivation behind this small game project is to introduce game development to my son. He currently shows great interest in the process of making games, especially game design and creating art. I am very happy that he takes an interest in this and not only wanting to play Fortnite and Minecraft :D

Any donations will go directly to my son as "pocket money" so he can buy some ice-cream or a bit of candy :)

Keyboard:
- WASD or ARROWS to move, CTRL to shoot.

Gamepad is supported.
